data.title: VIT Milestones
data.meta_description: VIT has achieved several milestones since its inception as VEC in 1984.
data.text:
2022

✓ VIT has been ranked by MHRD NIRF Ranking, Govt. of India 2022

• 9th Best in University

• 10th best in Research

• 12th best in Engineering

• 18th best in Overall

✓ QS World University Ranking - within 1001 - 1200 in the world

✓ QS Asia Ranking: 198th Rank

✓ QS World University Ranking by Subject

• Engineering & Technology (Overall) - 346th in the world (India Rank - 9)

• Electrical and Electronic Engineering - within 251-300 in the world (India Rank - 8)

• Chemical Engineering - within 301-350 in the world (India Rank - 11)

• Computer Science & Information Systems - within 301-350 in the world (India Rank - 8)

• Mechanical and Manufacturing Engineering - within 301-350 in the world (India Rank - 9)

• Chemistry - within 401-450 in the world (India Rank - 10)

• Biological Sciences - within 551-600 in the world (India Rank - 14)

• Mathematics - within 451-500 in the world (India Rank - 11)

✓ Times Higher Education (THE) World University Ranking: within 801 - 1000 in the world

✓ Times Higher Education (THE) Asia Ranking - within 251-300 in the world

✓ Times Higher Education (THE) Young University Ranking - within 251-300 in the world

✓ Times Higher Education (THE) World University Ranking by Subject

• Computer Science - within 301-400 in the world

• Engineering & Technology - within 501-600 in the world

• Physical Sciences - within 601-800 in the world

• Life Sciences - within 601-800 in the world

✓ Times Higher Education - THE Impact Ranking

• Overall - within 301-400 in the world (India Rank within 9-11)

• Clean Water and Sanitation - 88th in the world (India Rank - 8)

• Affordable and Clean Energy - 9th in the World (India Rank - 3)

• Partnership for Goals - within 201-300 in the world (India Rank within 5-9)

• Good Health and Well-being - within 601-800 in the world (India Rank within 18-27)

✓ Shanghai Ranking of World Universities 2022 is within 601-700 and the top 2-3 in India.

✓ 48 VIT Professors are among the top 2% of scientists in the world, Stanford University Study, 2022.

✓ FICCI Awarded “Excellence in Implementing Institutional Social Responsibility” for the year 2022.

✓ The following new Undergraduate Programmes started in 2022:

• Bachelor of Commerce (Honours)

• B.Sc. Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics (2 major and one ancillary)

• B.Sc. Mathematics and Computing

✓ The following new Postgraduate Programme started in 2022:
